column3:
Heal the target for a small amount of HP. Can also deal damage to the undead.
Learning requirement:
Royal:Level 10
Mage:Level 4
Elf:Level 8
Knight:Level 20.

Use magic to summon a light source that illuminates an area around the spell caster for 3600 secs.
Learning requirement:
Royal:Level 10
Mage:Level 4
Elf:Level 8
Knight:Level 10.

Form a protective shield and increase own AC by 2 points. Cannot be stacked.
Learning requirement:
Royal:Level 10
Mage:Level 4
Elf:Level 8
Knight:Level 30.

Launch a magic missile that deals a small amount of damage to the target.Mage class will consume 0 mana when casting this spell under level 30; Elf and Royal class will consume 0 mana when casrting this spell under level 20.
Learning requirement:
Royal:Level 10
Mage:Level 4
Elf:Level 8
Knight:Level 50.

Teleport to a random place. Can also select a specific spot to teleport to by using \Ring of Teleportation".
Learning requirement:
Royal:Level 10
Mage:Level 4
Elf:Level 8
Knight:Level 50."

Shoot arrows of ice at the target to deal damage to them.
Learning requirement:
Royal:Level 10
Mage:Level 4
Elf:Level 8
Knight:Level 50.

Throw a blade made of wind to deal damage to the target.
Learning requirement:
Royal:Level 10
Mage:Level 4
Elf:Level 8
Knight:Level 50.

Empower weapons to increase damage. The empowered weapon will be able to deal additional damage on the undead.
Learning requirement:
Royal:Level 10
Mage:Level 4
Elf:Level 8
Knight:Level 40.

Use magic to cure the target and heal them from poison.
Learning requirement:
Royal:Level 20
Mage:Level 8
Elf:Level 16.

Absorb some HP from target and add it to your own. Casting this spell causes your Lawful value to decrease by 2.
Learning requirement:
Royal:Level 20
Mage:Level 8
Elf:Level 16.

Use magic to create toxins, which have a chance to poison the target, causing them to suffer from continued toxic damage. Casting this spell causes your Lawful value to decrease by 10.
Learning requirement:
Royal:Level 20
Mage:Level 8
Elf:Level 16.

Increase target weapon’s damage by 2 points.
Learning requirement:
Royal:Level 20
Mage:Level 8
Elf:Level 16.

Reveal hidden monsters and players and make them visible.
Learning requirement:
Royal:Level 20
Mage:Level 8
Elf:Level 16.

Increase own load bearing capacity for a period of time, allowing you to carry more items.
Learning requirement:
Royal:Level 20
Mage:Level 8
Elf:Level 16.

Conjure magic flaming arrows and shoot them at enemy targets to deal damage.
Learning requirement:
Royal:Level 20
Mage:Level 8
Elf:Level 16.

Cast an earth spell that causes spikes to sprout under enemy units and deal damage.
Learning requirement:
Royal:Level 20
Mage:Level 8
Elf:Level 16.

Deal damage on the enemies in a straight line right in front of you with the power of lightning.
Learning requirement:
Mage:Level 12
Elf:Level 24.

Chance to kill the undead on the spot, but there is also a 5% probability of enraging them.
Learning requirement:
Mage:Level 12
Elf:Level 24.

Recover the target's HP. Can also deal damage on the undead.
Learning requirement:
Mage:Level 12
Elf:Level 24.

Block the enemies' view with magic, with a chance to blind the target for a period of time. However, using this magic spell will cause your Lawful value to decrease by 10.
Learning requirement:
Mage:Level 12
Elf:Level 24.

Increase the AC of your own Armor by 3 points. This spell does not stack.
Learning requirement:
Mage:Level 12
Elf:Level 24.

Launch a powerful icy attack at the target, dealing freezing damage on the target and enemies within 1 unit distance from them.
Learning requirement:
Mage:Level 12
Elf:Level 24.

Use magic to detect the attributes that your enemies fear the most.
Learning requirement:
Mage:Level 12
Elf:Level 24.

Cast blazing fireballs to burn the target and enemies within one unit distance from the target.
Learning requirement:
Mage:Level 16
Elf:Level 32.

Cast a wind spell that increases target’s dexterity by 5 points. Can be used only on those in your Clan. Effect does not stack.
Learning requirement:
Mage:Level 16
Elf:Level 32.

Use magic to wrap around targets' weapons, possibly damaging them. Casting this spell causes your Lawful value to decrease by 10.
Learning requirement:
Mage:Level 16
Elf:Level 32.

Absorb target’s HP and add it to your own. Using this spell causes your Lawful value to decrease by 5.
Learning requirement:
Mage:Level 16
Elf:Level 32.

Change the environment around the enemies with wind power, with a chance to reduce all speed types of the target.
Learning requirement:
Mage:Level 16
Elf:Level 32.

Create giant brambles that sprout from underground and wrap themselves around the target, dealing damage on the target and enemies within one unit distance from them.
Learning requirement:
Mage:Level 16
Elf:Level 32.

Cast a protective magical shield around self, protecting self from one magic attack. Last for 5 secs.
Learning requirement:
Mage:Level 16
Elf:Level 32.

Go into meditative state, in which your MP recovery rate is faster than usual. However, this will no longer be effective as soon as you move, cast a spell or perform any battle actions.
Learning requirement:
Mage:Level 16
Elf:Level 32.

Summon a mummy to rise from the ground and attack your enemies, with a chance to paralyze target. Casting this spell causes your Lawful value to decrease by 500.
Learning requirement:
Mage:Level 20
Elf:Level 40.

Summon lightning to strike down your enemies, dealing serious damage on the target.
Learning requirement:
Mage:Level 20
Elf:Level 40.

Recover a great amount of HP for the target. Also deals damage on the undead.
Learning requirement:
Mage:Level 20
Elf:Level 40.

Chance to bewitch target monster and make it follow you. The weaker the target’s HP, the greater the probability of success.
Learning requirement:
Mage:Level 20
Elf:Level 40.

Emit a holy light to remove the curse on the target.
Learning requirement:
Mage:Level 20
Elf:Level 40.

Unleash frozen spikes on the target, dealing damage.
Learning requirement:
Mage:Level 20
Elf:Level 40.

Chance to absorb target's MP and convert of the MP absorbed for yourself.
Learning requirement:
Mage:Level 20
Elf:Level 40.

Summon a dark shadow, which has a chance to blind the target for 32 secs. Casting this spell causes your Lawful value to decrease by 10.
Learning requirement:
Mage:Level 20
Elf:Level 40.

Create a puppet from the target, which will follow and support the spell caster. Casting this spell will cause your Lawful value to decrease by 10.
Learning requirement:
Mage:Level 24
Elf:Level 48.

Use flames to increase target's STR by 5 points. Can only be used on Clan members. Effect does not stack.
Learning requirement:
Mage:Level 24
Elf:Level 48.

Increase speed of target for 20 mins. Spell cannot be cast again while still active on target.
Learning requirement:
Mage:Level 24
Elf:Level 48.

Dispel enemies' magic spells with the power of the wind. Has a chance to remove all magic effects on target.
Learning requirement:
Mage:Level 24
Elf:Level 48.

Tear enemies apart with the power of the earth, dealing serious damage.
Learning requirement:
Mage:Level 24
Elf:Level 48.

Cause fiery explosions on target, dealing a huge amount of damage.
Learning requirement:
Mage:Level 24
Elf:Level 48.

Chance to lower the target's close combat physical ATK damage and hit rate. Casting this spell causes your Lawful value to decrease.
Learning requirement:
Mage:Level 24
Elf:Level 48.

Empower target's weapon by casting a blessing spell on it. This increases the target's DMG and hit rate.
Learning requirement:
Mage:Level 24
Elf:Level 48.
Heal all Clan members on the screen.\nLearning requirement:\nMage:Level 28.
Deal damage on the target, with the possibility of freezing them for 5 secs. When frozen, the target cannot be attacked and cannot move.\nLearning requirement:\nMage:Level 28.

Summon monsters that fight for you. The number of monsters summoned depends on the spell caster’s level of charisma. The spell caster’s level affects the types of monsters summoned. Casting this spell causes your Lawful value to decrease by 10.\nLearning requirement:\nMage:Level 28.
Empower the spell caster's own feet to increase movement speed.\nLearning requirement:\nMage:Level 28.
Summon a strong whirlwind, dealing damage on all enemies within 2 units of distance from the spell caster.\nLearning requirement:\nMage:Level 28.
Increase spell caster’s speed by 50% for 30 mins. Does not stack.\nLearning requirement:\nMage:Level 28.

Increase the close combat physical ATK by 5 points for self, friendly units and Clan members. However, AC will decrease by 10 points and HP will no longer be automatically replenished.\nLearning requirement:\nMage:Level 28.

Make enemies sick, with the possibility of lowering their AC by 12 points and hit rate by 6 points. Casting this spell causes your Lawful value to decrease by 10.\nLearning requirement:\nMage:Level 28.
Recover a huge amount of HP for the target. Can also deal damage on the undead.\nLearning requirement:\nMage:Level 32.
Create a magical flaming wall that deals damage on all enemies that touch it.\nLearning requirement:\nMage:Level 32.

Summon an icy blizzard, dealing damage on all enemies within 5 units of distance from spell caster. Casting this spell causes your Lawful value to decrease by 10.\nLearning requirement:\nMage:Level 32.
Make the spell caster invisible. However, the spell will no longer be effective if the caster attacks or performs any other similar actions.\nLearning requirement:\nMage:Level 32.
Resurrect the dead target with full HP.\nLearning requirement:\nMage:Level 32.
Trigger earthquakes near the spell caster to deal damage on the enemies within one unit distance from the spell caster.\nLearning requirement:\nMage:Level 32.
Create an energy ring that increases the HP recovery speed of all players within range.\nLearning requirement:\nMage:Level 32.
Seal the target with magic, with the possibility of causing them to be unable to use magic during the effective period.\nLearning requirement:\nMage:Level 32.
Summon lightning and stormy winds to deal damage on the target and enemies within one unit distance from them.\nLearning requirement:\nMage:Level 36.

Chance to make the target and enemies within one unit distance from them fall asleep for 32 secs. Enemies will be awakened as soon as you attack them. Casting this spell causes your Lawful value to decrease by 10.\nLearning requirement:\nMage:Level 36.
Chance to temporarily change the form of the target.\nLearning requirement:\nMage:Level 36.
Create a huge magical protective shield for Clan members, under which all damage received will be halved during its duration.\nLearning requirement:\nMage:Level 36.

Teleport the spell caster and Clan members within one unit distance from them to a random location. May select a specific spot to teleport to when using \Ring of Teleportation\".\nLearning requirement:\nMage:Level 36."
Casting a flaming tornado, deals damage to all targets (except White name and Blue name players) around the caster.\nLearning requirement:\nMage:Level 36.
Freeze all potions on the target, has a chance to cause them to be unable to use any potions during the effective period.\nLearning requirement:\nMage:Level 36.
Find hidden monsters and players on the screen, making them visible and dealing damage on them.\nLearning requirement:\nMage:Level 36.
Chance to change the spell caster’s weapon into a +1 weapon permanently. Cannot be used repeatedly on the same weapon.\nLearning requirement:\nMage:Level 40.
Summon meteors to smash your enemies, dealing great damage on the target and enemies within one unit distance from them.\nLearning requirement:\nMage:Level 40.
Resurrect the dead target with full HP as well as 25% of the EXP lost upon death.\nLearning requirement:\nMage:Level 40.
Cast an earth spell to change the topography of an area, has a chance of reducing the speed of the target and enemies within one unit distance from them.\nLearning requirement:\nMage:Level 40.
Summon a giant light bayonet from heaven to stab at the target, dealing fatal damage. Casting this spell causes your Lawful value to increase by 1.\nLearning requirement:\nMage:Level 40.

Create an invincible protective shield for the spell caster. It will block all attacks for 12 secs. If the spell caster casts another spell during the effective period, the shield will disappear.\nLearning requirement:\nMage:Level 40.
While active, increase target's max HP and MP by 20%.\nLearning requirement:\nMage:Level 40.

Summon a swirling snowstorm, dealing damage on enemies within 5 units distance from the spell caster. Has a chance to freeze the target. Casting this spell causes your Lawful value to decrease by 10.\nLearning requirement:\nMage:Level 40.
May possibly stun the target for a few seconds. This skill can be used only when two-handed swords are equipped.\nLearning requirement:\nKnight:Level 50.
Increase AC and reduce the amount of damage received. The higher the level, the greater amount of damage will be reduced.\nLearning requirement:\nKnight:Level 50.
Cause magical spikes to sprout from your armor. Has a chance to damage the weapons of enemies who try to attack you at a close range.\nLearning requirement:\nKnight:Level 60.
Increase own evasion rate. It only works when a shield is equipped.\nLearning requirement:\nKnight:Level 50.

Has a chance to reflect close combat physical damage received back to the attacked. This skill can only be used when two-handed sword type weapons are equipped.\nLearning requirement:\nKnight:Level 50.

Mark a non-allied target for 45 secs, during which its location will be revealed to the spell caster's allies. Marked targets will suffer additional damage from attacks.\nLearning requirement:\nRoyal:Level 15.
Increase MR and hit rate for yourself and friendly units. This status will remove Shining Aura.\nLearning requirement:\nRoyal:Level 40.
Increase 8 AC for yourself, friendly units and Clan members. This status will remove Glowing Aura.\nLearning requirement:\nRoyal:Level 55.
Summon members from the same Clan to your current position.\nLearning requirement:\nRoyal:Level 30.
Increase physical ATK by 5 points for yourself and friendly units.\nLearning requirement:\nRoyal:Level 50.
Teleport yourself to a specific member from the same Clan.\nLearning requirement:\nRoyal:Level 45.
Increase the spell caster’s MR by 10%.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 10.
Convert 8 points of your own HP into 2 points of MP.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 10.
The spell caster will be immediately teleported to the Yggdrasil, unless if they're located in an area where teleporting is prohibited.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 10.
Launch 3 arrows all at once, dealing damage on the enemy target. Only works when a bow is equipped.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 30.
Has a chance to lower target’s elemental resistance to your own elemental type by 50%.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 40.
While active, has a chance to reflect magic attacks.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 50.
Increase the spell caster's Wisdom by 3 points. Cannot be stacked.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 20.
Strengthen the spell caster’s AC against all attributes by 10%.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 20.
Has a chance to release monsters which were summoned or tamed.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 30.
Convert 34 own HP into 12 MP.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 30.
Increase spell caster's attributive resistance by 50%.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 30.
Increase target’s physical attack value by 4 points.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 30.
Increase target’s ranged hit rate by 6 points.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 30.
While active, increase spell caster’s movement speed.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 30.
Increase target’s AC by 6 points. Does not stack.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 30.
Has a chance to lower target’s movement speed by 25%.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 30.
Has a chance to decrease target's MR by 75%. Target's MR will recover after they receive magic damage for the first time.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 40.
Summon an elemental with the same attribute as yours.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 40.
Increase 4 points of physical ATK for yourself and friendly units.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 40.
Increase hit rate of ranged attacks by 2 points and ranged damage by 3 points for yourself and friendly units.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 40.
Has a chance to make the enemy unit that is hit unable to attack any target for 6 secs.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 40.
Increase target's HP recovery rate. The higher the level, the greater the amount of recovery. The maximum recovery amount is 15.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 40.
AC increases by 7 points for you and friendly units.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 40.
Protect target with water magic, increasing target's Evasion rate by 5 points.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 40.
Has a chance to disable magic use for all players and NPCs on screen for 16 secs.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 50.
Summon a powerful elemental with the same attribute as yours.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 50.
Increase spell caster’s close combat physical ATK by 6 points.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 50.
Recover a certain amount of HP for friendly units.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 50.
Resurrect dead targets with full HP and 0 MP.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 50.
Decrease the spell caster’s ranged attack hit rate by 1 point, but increase ranged damage by 5 points.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 50.
Has a chance to decrease the enemy's attack speed during the effective period.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 50.
While active, increases the spell caster's AC by 10 points.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 50.
Allows spell caster to recover HP and MP even when overloaded with items.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 50.
While active, double the effect of the first healing spell cast on the target.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 30.
While active, there is a 33% probability of increasing own physical ATK damage by 150%.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 50.
Teleport to a designated point with no obstacles between you and the designated point.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 50.
While active, has a chance to reduce the target's healing effect by 50%.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 50.
While active, has a chance to cause the target to become completely unable to evade ranged attacks.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 50.
While active, maximize the close combat weapon ATK of the spell caster.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 50.
Allows spell caster to recover HP and MP even when overloaded with items.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 50.
